metadata.title: CVE-2021-38000 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Intents in Google Chrome onAndroid prior to 95.0.4638.69 allowed a remote attacker to arbitrarilybrowser to a malicious URL via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
